course_title: Interdisciplinary Studies in Arts - NAV PLRTY IN POL

001.comments: This course deals with highly politicized issues, including racism and feminism, through the contours of capitalism. Unlike other courses which unpack the history or structural causes of these issues, this seminar is centered on how we talk about them. Drawing insight from political and philosophical theorists, students will analyze narratives surrounding contemporary politics in relation to the polarizing debates that consume it. Participants will also relate these topics to non-academic voices to reflect on what literary and artistic representations tell us about societal values and fears. In this way, the primary theme of this course is the dialogue and connection between these various isms.
